examples.prompt: Create a workflow that monitors a GitHub repository for new issues, analyzes them with AI to determine priority, and creates corresponding tasks in Jira with appropriate labels
Build a data pipeline that extracts data from multiple PostgreSQL tables, transforms it using JavaScript, aggregates the results, and loads them into BigQuery. Run this every night at 2 AM

Set up a customer feedback system: receive form submissions via webhook, sentiment analysis with AI, send positive feedback to Slack #kudos channel, negative to #support with urgency flag, and store all in Google Sheets
Monitor RSS feeds from tech blogs, filter for articles about AI and automation, summarize them, and create a weekly digest email sent to subscribers
